alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 1:31AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIDESPREAD HEAVY SNOW AND DANGEROUSLY COLD TEMPERATURES EXPECTED... .Beginning this morning, the first of two rounds of snow is expected to impact the area, primarily affecting far northwestern South Dakota and higher elevations of the northern and central Black Hills. More widespread heavy snow arrives tonight into Wednesday, with heavy snow expected area-wide. The combination of heavy snow and breezy winds will lead to dangerous or impossible travel conditions across northeastern Wyoming and western South Dakota through early Thursday. Dangerously cold Arctic air will accompany the snow, with wind chills as low as 30 to 40 below zero expected across the area Wednesday morning through at least Thursday. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation and the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston
